articles.author: Una Hajdari
articles.title: Serbian parliament erupts into chaos as opposition hurl smoke bombs and flares - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Months of tense confrontations peaked when opposition MPs attempted to block ruling party from enacting new laws.
articles.content:
Meanwhile, citizens gathered in front of the parliament and pelted the entrance with raw eggs.
In January, Serbian Prime Minister Milo Vuevi offered his resignation amid public outrage and nationwid… [+800 chars]
